Description: String of blue glazed composition disc-beads and falcon pendant.
Curator's comments: Dated, in agreement with Griffith, to the period prior to the Twelfth Dynasty. See also W. Y Adams, 'Nubia Corridor to Africa' (London, 1977), 143 ff. Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 75-6.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (361)
